timesheet.periodHoursSummaryText: You have a total of **{{hours}}** this period.
timesheet.hoursNotMatchedText: You have **{{hours}}** that are not matched. All events must be matched before you can confirm your hours.
timesheet.allHoursMatchedText: All your hours are matched. Are you ready to confirm the period?
timesheet.periodConfirmedText: The period is confirmed with {{hours}}. Click **Unconfirm hours** if you want to do some adjustments.
timesheet.unresolvedErrorText: You have {{count}} unresolved errors. You need to resolve them before confirming the hours
timesheet.splitWeekInfoText: Selected week spans two months. Navigate between the first and second period using the command bar above.
timesheet.projectInactiveError: Project is no longer active. Please resolve the event in Outlook.
timesheet.customerInactiveError: Customer is no longer active. Please resolve the event in Outlook.
timesheet.noProjectMatchFoundText: No match found. Click **Resolve** to match the event manually or **Ignore** to ignore it.
timesheet.matchOutlookInfoText: **Please note:** You should try your best to matchthe event in Outlook, but in some cases it might be neccessary to manually match.
timesheet.eventNotFullyMatchedText: Event not matched. We found a matching customer **{{name}}**, but not a project with the specified key.
timesheet.customerInactiveErrorText: The customer is no longer active. Edit the event in Outlook.
timesheet.projectInactiveErrorText: The project is no longer active. Edit the event in Outlook.
timesheet.errorMessageText: There was a problem fetching your timesheet. Please try again later...
timesheet.exchangeLicenseErrorMessageText: Could not load timesheet. It seems you don't have an active Exchange Online license. Please contact your administrator.
timesheet.forecastHoursSecondaryText: Create a forecast for the week

projects.inactiveText: This project has been marked as inactive.
projects.categoryOutlookText: This project has a category in your Outlook.
projects.outlookCategoryInfoText: Here you can see the projects that have a corresponding category in Outlook.
projects.noTimeEntriesText: No time entries registered for the project.
projects.timeEntriesErrorText: An error occured loading time entries for the project.
projects.keyFieldDescription: A unique identifier for the project. Used together with the customer key to form the key used to tag events in Outlook. Keep it short, maximum {{keyMaxLength}} characters.
projects.nameFormValidationText: Name should be at least {{nameMinLength}} characters long.
projects.keyFormValidationText: Project key should be between {{keyMinLength}} and {{keyMaxLength}} characters long, and all uppercase.
projects.createSuccess:
The project **{{name}}** was succesfully created. 
Use **{{projectId}}** to tag your events in Outlook.
projects.inactiveFieldDescription: Mark the project as inactive. Hours for the project can no longer be confirmed.
projects.idPreviewText: You tag your calendar entries in Outlook with **{{projectId}}**. You can automatically create a category in Outlook by checking _Automatically create category in Outlook_.
projects.createOutlookCategoryFieldDescription:
Create category {{id}} in Outlook. 
This makes it easier to associate your Outlook events with the right project and customer.
projects.nameFieldDescription: The name of the project. This will be visible in your Timesheet, and in the project overview.
projects.descriptionFieldDescription: Describe the project in more detail.
projects.idPreviewBlankText: You will use a combination of customer key and project key to tag your events in Outlook. You can automatically create a category in Outlook by checking _Automatically create category in Outlook_.

customers.inactiveText: This customer has been marked as inactive.
customers.keyFieldDescription: A unique identifier for the customer. Keep it short, maximum {{keyMaxLength}} characters and only capital letters.
customers.nameFormValidationText: Name should be at least {{nameMinLength}} characters long.
customers.keyFormValidationText: Customer key should be between {{keyMinLength}} and {{keyMaxLength}} characters long, and all uppercase.

admin.noTimeEntriesText: There are no confirmed hours for the selected months in the selected year.
admin.tokenGeneratedText: Your key has been generated and will only be visible for 10 seconds. You can only see it once. Take good care of it!
admin.tokenErrorText: An error occurred generating your key. Please try again later.
admin.summaryLoadingText: Loading time entries and creating summary...

reports.generatingReportLabel: Generating report. To give you the freshest results, we're generating a report from the latest data...
reports.noEntriesText: There's no time entries at this time.
reports.selectReportText: Select a report above. Be aware that some reports can take several minutes to load.

common.deviceViewNotSupported: This view is not available on your device.

notifications.emptyText: You have no active notifications at this time.
